html:
raised up one. The Lord will raise up a conqueror (see commentary on 41:2) from the north, speaking of Cyrus. Though Cyrus was from the east (see commentary on 41:2), he would conquer from the north.

shall he call upon my name. At the beginning of his reign, Cyrus claimed to believe in all Middle Eastern gods, but once the prophecies of Isaiah were brought to his attention, he turned to Jehovah at least to a degree (see commentary on 45:5).

upon princes as upon mortar. Cyrus "tramples on rulers as if they were mud, like a potter trampling clay" (GNB). Cyrus' enemies will provide no obstacles for him (41:2-3).
